name: Nothing to be done
description:
Explore a sombre world of two people who no longer believe that future holds any change. Spend with them some time to discover if their anticipations are also yours. Explore their greatest fears and deepest desires and observe how their indecisiveness makes things grotesquely funny.

Help Cician and Cobra finish the great piece of art they're working on. Get acquainted with mysterious ways of their maniac minds and find a way to ease their ever-burning pain.

This game is a tribute to a classic play: Waiting for Godot. It tries to connect two very distant worlds: theatre and adventure game. By playing it you become an actor and, to some reasonable extents, the writer and the director.

Features


  • Immersive world which is not only a theatre scene but also a fully interactive environment with people to talk, objects to manipulate and themes to investigate.
  • Story that develops in a direction you choose - by picking dialogue lines you find most interesting.
  • Contains lots of dark humour that hopefully induces self-reflection.
  • In core mechanics the game resembles classic point-and-click adventure games but is extended with an advanced dialogue system, typical for RPG games.
